1.title: Ban Animal Testing in Cosmetics
1.summary: Urge Congress to support the Humane Cosmetics Act.
1.script: Hello, I'm calling to ask for your support in banning animal testing in cosmetics. Please support the Humane Cosmetics Act.

2.title: Protect Endangered Wolves
2.summary: Stop the delisting of gray wolves from the endangered species list.
2.script: Hi, Iâ€™m concerned about the removal of protections for gray wolves. Please vote to keep them on the endangered species list.
